item.title: CVE-2024-34796|2024-06-03T10:34:53.367Z -- accessally -- popupally
item.description: Improper Neutralization of Input During Web Page Generation (XSS or 'Cross-site Scripting') vulnerability in AccessAlly PopupAlly allows Stored XSS.This issue affects PopupAlly: from n/a through 2.1.1.
